Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Subjects.ModelSubject
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Game
public class Game extends ModelSubject
Model of the MVC pattern, it represents the game itself.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Game constructor.

  • Method Details

    • addFirstPlayer

      public void addFirstPlayer(String nickName, boolean expertMode, int numberOfPlayers)
      First method that has to be called to properly start the game. Adds the first player to the game and sets game mode and number of players basing on his choices.
      Parameters:
      nickName - chosen by the player.
      expertMode - chosen by the player (true for expert, else base).
      numberOfPlayers - chosen by the player (from 2 to 4).

    • setNumberOfPlayers

      public void setNumberOfPlayers(int numberOfPlayers)
      Sets the number of player when selected by the first player.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - to play with in total.

    • addAnotherPlayer

      public void addAnotherPlayer(String nickname)
      First action to do when a player that is not the first one asks to join a match.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player that has to be added.

    • playAssistantCard

      public void playAssistantCard(int playerID, int turnOrderPlayed)
      Handles a player that plays an assistant card. It is responsible for changing the discard pile of a certain player.
      Parameters:
      playerID - is an integer that represents the index of the players ArrayList which corresponds to the player who played the assistant card.
      turnOrderPlayed - is the turn order of the AssistantCard played.

    • moveStudentInIsle

      public void moveStudentInIsle(int playerID, int isleID, int colorIndex)
      Takes a student from the dashboard of a certain player and puts it on a specified isle.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player who moved the student.
      isleID - ID of the chosen island.
      colorIndex - is the index of the color of the student that has been moved.

    • moveStudentInDiningRoom

      public void moveStudentInDiningRoom(int playerID, int colorIndex)
      Takes a student from the dashboard of a certain player and puts it in his dining room.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player who moved the student.
      colorIndex - color of the student that has been moved.

    • checkStudentInMoneyPosition

      public void checkStudentInMoneyPosition(int playerID, RealmColors color)
      Checking if the student is added in third, sixth or ninth position of the dining room (when playing expert mode).
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that placed a student in his dining room.
      color - color of the student placed.

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(int playerID, int isleID)
      Moves mother nature on a certain isle.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player who moved the mother nature.
      isleID - ID of the isle where the player wants to move mother nature.

    • pickStudentsFromCloud

      public void pickStudentsFromCloud(int playerID, int cloudID)
      It picks the students present on a certain cloud and puts them on the entrance of the player.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player who chose the cloud.
      cloudID - ID of the chosen cloud.

    • isLastRound

      public boolean isLastRound()
      Getter method for the last round.
      Returns:
      true if this was the last round, else false.

    • isGameEnded

      public boolean isGameEnded()
      Getter method for the end of the game state.
      Returns:
      if the game ended or not.

    • isGameEndedInADraw

      public boolean isGameEndedInADraw()
      Getter method for the end of the game in a draw state.
      Returns:
      if the game ended in a draw or not.

    • getWinner

      public String getWinner()
      Getter method for the nickname of the player who won (or, if it is a 4 Players match, the squad).
      Returns:
      the nickname of the winner.

    • notifyTurn

      public void notifyTurn()
      Initialize the parameters that handle the turn order and notifies the view.

    • checkUpdateProfessor

      public void checkUpdateProfessor(int playerID, RealmColors color)
      Invoked when a student has been added to the dining room of a certain player and updates the professors owned by players, if it is necessary.
      Parameters:
      playerID - index of the players ArrayList which corresponds to the player whose dining room has been updated.
      color - color of the student that has been moved to the dining room, therefore it is the color of the professor we need to check.

    • checkUpdateInfluence

      public void checkUpdateInfluence(int isleID)
      Invoked when mother nature ends on acceptable isle and updates all tower references, if it is necessary (it also calls a method to verify if isles union has to occur).
      Parameters:
      isleID - index of the isle which has mother nature on it.

    • checkEndGame

      public void checkEndGame()
      It checks if the game has ended and updates the proper end game variables.

    • playCharacterCard

      public void playCharacterCard(int playerID, int characterCardIndex)
      Permits to play a character card during the action phase. It set money and other booleans but doesn't activate the proper effect of the card.
      Parameters:
      playerID - the id of the player who plays a certain character card during his action phase.
      characterCardIndex - the index of the character card that the player wants to play.

    • activateAtomicEffect

      public void activateAtomicEffect(int playerID, int characterCardIndex, int value1, int value2)
      Permits to activate an atomic effect called in the controller for a certain number of times.
      Parameters:
      playerID - the id of the player who plays the character card.
      characterCardIndex - the index of the character card played.
      value1 - it represents different values based on the played card. MONK -> isle index where to move the student. HERALD -> isle where calculate the influence now. When not used -> set to 0.
      value2 - the color of the student the player wants to remove from the staring StudentsManager.

    • notifyEffectUpdate

      public void notifyEffectUpdate(int characterCardIndex, int playerID, int value1, int value2)
      Initialize the parameters needed by the view consequently to the activation of the atomic effect of a character card.
      Parameters:
      characterCardIndex - index of the character card played.
      playerID - ID of the player that played the character card.
      value1 - value that assumes a different meaning based on the character card played (color, isle index or -1 when not required).
      value2 - value that assumes a different meaning based on the character card played (color or -1 when not required).

    • setColorForFungist

      public void setColorForFungist(int indexColorFungist)
      Saves a color in the class GAME for then FUNGIST character card when played.
      Parameters:
      indexColorFungist - the index of the color that has to be saved.

    • getPlayerByIndex

      public Player getPlayerByIndex(int playerIndex)
      Getter method that permits to know who is the player in the list of players that has a certain index.
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - the index of the player that is in the list.
      Returns:
      the player associated with that index.

    • getGameTable

      public GameTable getGameTable()
      Getter method that permits to pick the current game table.
      Returns:
      the current game table.

    • setGamePhase

      public void setGamePhase(GamePhases gameP)
      Used for testing purpose only.
      Parameters:
      gameP - game phase.

    • getGamePhase

      public GamePhases getGamePhase()
      Getter method for the game phase.
      Returns:
      the actual game phase.

    • isExpertMode

      public boolean isExpertMode()
      Getter method that tells if the game mode is expert or not.
      Returns:
      true if expert, else false.

    • getPlayers

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()
      Getter method that returns the list of players who are playing the game.
      Returns:
      the list of players who are playing the game.

    • getFirstPlayerIndex

      Returns:
      the index of the first player.

    • getPlayerCounter

      Returns:

      Parameters:
